Articles.Content:
In this awesome challenge the challenge is to beat the challenge.

Rule:1 i haven't told the challenge yet...

The challenge is to finish your current challenge then when your done you do this challenge the challenge is ( i hope i spelled challenge right) to crash into the mun at over 10000M/s. i hope it brings back noob days because its a challenge if you beat the challenge of crashing into the mun (Because landing is to hardcore) ill give you a *Real Raisin* (troll face) ---ACCEPT CHALLENGE

Rule 1/2: you cant use cheats

Rule 3: what the heck why are there rules? JUST GO CRASHING!!!!!!!! and win

First off, welcome to the forum.

Second, please read the Challenge Submission Guidelines.

I'd urge you to make your challenge a bit more structured, give it a points system, requirements/limitations. Maybe look over your writing style as well, I don't mean the spelling but reading "noob", "troll face", all caps and lots of exclamation marks is somewhat offputting to us more serious folks.

Welcome to the forum!

Also, are you aware that there's a thing called spell check?

So the challenge is to complete a challenge that you haven't told us about yet?

Edited September 3, 2013 by duncan1297
Spelling
Mun crash. I believe this has already been perfected, breaking the Mun, and is well documented on video by Danny2642.
